name: Softlanding
description:
Founded in 2000, Softlanding helps organizations be their best by providing technology solutions and services that make them more productive. Softlanding specializes in Microsoft enterprise technology platforms, leveraging a combination of cloud, on-premises and hybrid configurations to increase productivity from the data center on out to end business users. Platform specialties include SharePoint, Azure, Office 365, Power BI, Skype for Business, Enterprise Mobility Suite and System Center.
As a recognized leader in empowering enterprises with solutions and services built on the Microsoft Cloud and on-premises platforms, Softlanding is proud to be a Microsoft Field Managed Systems Integration Partner, an EMS Elite Partner and a Microsoft Cloud Accelerate/Deployment Partner.  Accordingly, Softlanding is listed in PROFIT 500 as one of Canada's Fastest-Growing Companies.​ Our people are our most important asset. Our corporate culture provides an atmosphere where creative thinking thrives helping our people be their best. We focus on fostering true client partnerships and apply a partnership approach to all of our service offerings. Whether augmenting information technology resources within organizations or providing complete outsource solutions, the partnership approach helps us "empower" our clients.
